(Simplified: 鹑)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 享 indicates the sound; 鳥 (bird) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 享 [ xiǎng ] to share; to enjoy; to benefit from
    • 鳥 [ niǎo ] bird
①(鵪鶉)見“(鶉)鵪”。

鶉字的基本解释

鶉
chún
见“鹑”。

鶉字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chún］
［《廣韻》常倫切，平諄，禪。］
“鹑1”的繁体字。
(1)鸟名。本指羽毛有斑的鹌鹑，后亦混称鹌鹑。
(2)传说中的赤凤。参见“鶉鳥”。
(3)星宿名。
(4)鹑衣的略称。
(5)通“醇”。纯美。
[②]［tuán］
［《集韻》徒官切，平桓，定。］
“鹑2”的繁体字。
即雕。

鶉字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鶉； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1493第23
【廣韻】常倫切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】殊倫切，?音淳。【廣韻】䳺鶉。【本草】鶉大如雞雛，頭細而無尾，有斑點，雄者足高，雌者足?。【淮南子·時則訓】田䑕化爲鶉。又【畢萬術】蝦蟆得爪化爲鶉。【交州記】南海有黃魚，九月則化爲鶉。【陸佃云】鶉無常居，而有常匹，故《尸子》曰：堯鶉居。詩曰：鶉之奔奔。言鶉能不亂其匹，衞人以爲宣姜鶉之不如也。又俗言此鳥性淳，飛必附草，行不越草，遇草橫前，卽旋行避之，故曰鶉。【正字通】鶉尾特禿，若衣之短結，故凡敝衣曰衣若縣鶉。又【山海經】崑崙之丘有鳥，名鶉鳥。是司帝之百服。又星名。【埤雅】南方朱鳥七宿，曰鶉首，鶉火，鶉尾。又縣名。【前漢·地理志】安定郡鶉隂縣。【後漢·郡國志】安定郡有鶉觚。又與醇同。【揚子·寡學篇】春木之芚兮，援我手之鶉兮。言孔子敎人，有以手援而醇和也。又【集韻】船倫切，音脣。義同。又【集韻】【正韻】?都昆切，音敦。【莊子·天地篇】聖人鶉居而鷇食。又【集韻】【正韻】徒官切【韻會】徒丸切，?音團。【詩·小雅】匪鶉

quail
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chún］
["Guangyun" Chang Lunqie, flat and simple, Zen. ]
The traditional characters of "Ji 1".
(1) The name of the bird. Originally refers to quail with spotted feathers, and later it is also called quail.
(2) The legendary Chifeng. See "quail bird".
(3) The name of the stars.
(4) Abbreviation for quail garment.
(5) Through "alcohol". Pure beauty.
[②]［tuán］
["Jiyun" cut to the official official, Ping Huan, Ding. ]
The traditional characters of "Ji 2".
That is carving.
quail
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Bird Character Department] 　 Quail; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 1493 Page 23
[Guang Yun] Chang Lunqi [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Recognized and cut,? Yin Chun. [Guang Yun] Bo Quail. 【Materia Medica】The quail is as big as a chick, with a thin head and no tail, with spots. The male has high feet and the female has feet. [Huainanzi·Shi Zexun] Tian Pi turned into a quail. Also 【Bi Wanshu】The claws of the prawns turned into quails. [Jiaozhou Ji] There are yellow croakers in the South China Sea, but they turn into quails in September. [Lu Dianyun] Quails have no permanent residence, but there are permanent horses. Therefore, "Ziezi" says: Yao Quail's residence. The poem said: The quail is running. Saying that a quail can not mess with its horse, the guard thinks that it is better to declare a ginger quail. It is also said that this bird is pure in nature, it must be attached to the grass when flying, and if it does not cross the grass, when it encounters the grass, it will avoid it in a whirl, so it is called a quail. 【Zhengzitong】The tail of the quail is particularly bald, and if the clothes have short knots, so wherever the clothes are called Yiruo County Quail. Also [Shanhai Jing] Kunlun Hill has birds, named Quail Birds. It is Sidi's hundred suits. Also star name. 【Piya】The southern vermilion bird has seven sleepers, said quail head, quail fire, and quail tail. Also the name of the county. [Former Han Geography] Jiuyin County, Anding County. [Hou Han·Jun Guo Zhi] There are quail goblets in Anding County. Also the same as alcohol. [Yangtze·Widows' Chapter] The Spring Wood's Flourish, the Helper's Quail. It is said that Confucius can help people with their hands and be gentle and gentle. Also [Jiyun] Chuan Lun cut, tone lips. The same meaning. Also 【Ji Yun】【Zheng Yun】? Du Kunqie, Yin Dun. 【Zhuangzi·Heaven and Earth】The sage lives and eats. Also [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun] Disciple Official Cut [Rhyme Meeting] Disciple Ball Cut, Sound Group. [Poetry·Xiaoya] Bandit Quail
